pets_dialog_success: Your Non-Fungible Friend has been set up successfully.
pets_dialog_check_title: Show NFT friends on the profile page.
share_twitter:
I just set up my Non-Fungible Friend with @realMaskNetwork. Visit my profile to check it out! Install Mask Network extension from mask.io and set yours.

pet_setting_tooltip$default: Click the Mask icon in the sidebar and access the Non-F Friends app to configure your personalized desktop NFT pet.
pet_setting_tooltip$punk: I'm CryptoPunk #6128! Voyagers, welcome to the uncharted waters of WEB3!
